text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters It’s sad to see that the Americans fall victim to the false news the way they have by paying attention to any “news” org. such as CNN but also fall victim to this fake COVID-19 news they willing to give up every freedom they have!
